snippet: FRIEDMAN--Gary Ross, M.D. We deeply mourn the loss of our friend, colleague, and Partner. He was a physician's physician, and sadly will be missed by his patients and all of us at ProHEALTH. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRIEDMAN--Gary Ross, M.D. We deeply mourn the loss of our friend, colleague, and Partner. He was a physician's physician, and sadly will be missed by his patients and all of us at ProHEALTH. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FRIEDMAN, GARY ROSS
